name: Tome of Mentorship
description: Double-click to gain one level. Only usable by characters under level 80. Only usable in PvE and WvW.

name: Letter from Eir
description:
"Solvi will be sorely missed, but he died a hero's death free of corruption. We have you to thank for that."
Double-click to gain 50 luck.

name: Letter from Zojja
description:
"After your riveting success today, you deserve applause. Don't let Teyo's deeds sully what you've accomplished."
Double-click to gain 50 luck.

name: Letter from Caithe
description:
"We'd have lost much had the stag died. Today was a triumph for nature, thanks to you."
Double-click to gain 50 luck.

name: Letter from Caithe
description:
"Let the loss of Ysvelta be a constant reminder of why we must stay strong against the Nightmare."
Double-click to gain 50 luck.

name: Letter from Logan
description:
"It's a great shame that Serentine's betrayal went unnoticed for so long. You've restored the reputation of the Seraph, and for that I'm sincerely grateful."
Double-click to gain 50 luck.

name: Letter from Eir
description:
"With Korag gone, his remaining tribe may finally know peace. Take pride in their new beginning, Slayer."
Double-click to gain 50 luck.

name: Letter from Eir
description:
"If not for you, there's no telling what Vidkun would have done to Minotaur. You saved a Spirit of the Wild—no small task."
Double-click to gain 50 luck.

name: Letter from Zojja
description:
"Gadd's lab was quite the fortuitous discovery. There were...unforeseen side effects, but you handled yourself brilliantly."
Double-click to gain 50 luck.

name: Letter from Logan
description:
"We never would have discovered the depths of Zamon's treachery without you. You've made me, the Seraph, and Kryta very proud."
Double-click to gain 50 luck.

name: Letter from Rytlock
description:
"Today you showed me cunning can cut deeper than a knife. Trybulus had us outnumbered, but we persevered. Good work."
Double-click to gain 50 luck.

name: Letter from Rytlock
description:
"As both man and ghost, Warmaster Lebofski's sent more than a few charr to the grave. And you stood up to him. Seems I was right about you."
Double-click to gain 50 luck.

name: Letter from Rytlock
description:
"To keep cool while things heat up is a rare quality. You're a true testament to the Blood Legion."
Double-click to gain 50 luck.

name: Letter from Caithe
description:
"Bercilak was a powerful foe, and you bested him in fair combat. Be proud of yourself."
Double-click to gain 50 luck.

name: Letter from Zojja
description:
"Astounding work! Kazz and Doxa couldn't be happier. Thanks to you, we've made amazing breakthroughs in metalurmagical bioessence divergences."
Double-click to gain 50 luck.

name: Letter from Logan
description:
"Even while acting as bait for Two-Blade Pete, you showed great courage. The Seraph, and I personally, owe you for your service."
Double-click to gain 50 luck.
